price: Baranavuze kandi bati: “Nimba iyi Qor’ani yamanuwe koko n’Imana Allah, ntiyari gupfuma Iyimanurira umugabo w’ijunja n’ijambo aturuka muri kamwe mu ducimbiri tubiri: agacimbiri ka Makka canke aka Twaa-ifu!”.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَتَيۡنِ عَظِيمٍ

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā nuzzila hādhā al-qur'ānu ʿalā rajulin mina al-qaryatayni ʿaẓīmin
